wikipedia_page.main: Geoffrey Archer (born 1944) is a fiction writer from London. He specialises in military adventures and spy thrillers and created the character Sam Packer.

response: * The 1987 book Skydancer by Geoffrey Archer features a fictional British Polaris submarine, HMS Retribution.
*Geoffrey Archer, fiction writer and former Defence Correspondent of ITN, lives in Kew.
* Baalbek – Libyan freighter, Eagle Trap by Geoffrey Archer, 1993
* USS Carl Jackson – Nimitz-class aircraft carrier, Eagle Trap by Geoffrey Archer, 1993
* Korund – Tango-class submarine, Eagle Trap by Geoffrey Archer, 1993
* Geoffrey Archer (writer), British author of military thrillers
* Geoffrey Archer (colonial administrator) (1882–1964), British colonial administrator
